Name: Path
About the game: The PATH is a minimalist puzzle game and contains 50 levels with increasing difficulty. There is just you, arrows and a set of puzzle game mechanics based on logic. You have to choose the right path to advance to the next challenge. In the game we don't have ads, time restriction or scores. Enjoy all levels while listening to a calm and relaxing soundtrack. Originals Music and Sound Effects No text, suitable for all languages Use only the mouse (point and click) Mental work out and lots of fun No time, ads, pressure or scores Each level is handcrafted made and unique
Meta Title: Path: Nov 15, 2022, Sérgio dos Reis and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Path? Check out the release date (Nov 15, 2022), developer insights from Sérgio dos Reis, and a complete game summary.
